fields.title: recurrent neural networks
fields.pointers:
* Other models of sequence data include:
**  [hidden Markov models](hidden_markov_models)
**  [linear dynamical systems](linear_dynamical_systems)
fields.summary: Recurrent neural networks (RNNs) are a kind of neural net often used to model sequence data. They maintain a hidden state which can "remember" certain aspects of the sequence it has seen. RNNs can be trained using backpropagation through time, although efficient training remains an open problem.
